name: AstroBank Ltd
goal: Banking institution aiming to provide benefit for the shareholders and also help the business community of Cyprus by providing services and financing.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Single market
euInitiatives: Banking Directives and regulations, AML, GDPR, EBA guidelines, Mifid II etc. Participating in the association of Cyprus Banks to promote several banking issues.
